    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Relativno gibanje v različnih opazovalnih sistemih</string>
            <string language="en">Compare Relative Motion in Different Frames</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vergleichen Sie relative Bewegung in den 
unterschiedlichen Feldern</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comparez le mouvement relatif dans différentes 
trames</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compare o movimento relativo em frames 
diferentes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Confronti il movimento relativo nei telai 
differenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συγκρίνετε τη σχετική κίνηση στα διαφορετικά πλαίσια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Compare el movimiento relativo en diversos 
marcos</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Sprehajalec hodi ob reki, poleg tega se po reki pelje tudi čoln.</string>
            <string language="en">Promenader is walking along the river and at the same time the boat is passing by.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">opazovalni sistem</string>
            <string language="en">reference frame</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">relativno gibanje</string>
            <string language="en">relative motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Promenader geht entlang den Fluß und 
gleichzeitig überschreitet das Boot vorbei.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Promenader marche le long du fleuve et en même 
temps le bateau passe près.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Promenader está andando ao longo do rio e ao 
mesmo tempo o barco está passando perto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Promenader sta camminando lungo il fiume ed allo 
stesso tempo la barca sta passando vicino.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Promenader περπατά κατά μήκος του ποταμού και 
συγχρόνως η βάρκα περνά από.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Promenader está recorriendo a lo largo del río 
y en el mismo tiempo el barco está pasando cerca.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bezugsfeld</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">relative Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">trame de référence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mouvement relatif</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">struttura di riferimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">movimento relativo</string>
          </keyword>
